attributes.action: To bring back the death penalty in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Because of more people entering the United Kngdom their is more serious crime being committed by rapists and murderers our laws need to strengthend to deal the serious issues and make our country stronge again like the United States of America, you the people who represent us in doing the right thing to protect your country and people above anything else.
attributes.background: To bring back death penalty to make our laws stronger again to deal with increasing rape and murders we the real people of this country need real Justice not just privileges.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357
